desc: Sucré is a restaurant and event space at 321 S First Ave in Morton, Illinois. Our menu offers ice cream, candy, fudge, milkshakes, edible cookie dough, and much more. Our event space is rentable and holds up to 60 people. Call 309-291-5065.

layout.text: Our entire shoppe is now available for rent for large and small events, small business pop ups, and markets. Add our rentalable trolley and your guests will be completely dazzled!
